eligibility:
PLG 1 Social Responsibility and Ethical Sensitivity (UG)
PLO 1.1: Evaluate initiatives to address social issues (RBTL5)
PLO 1.2: Assess business actions from ethical perspectives (RBTL5)
PLG 2 Functional Knowledge and Application (UG)
PLO 2.1: Analyse theories/ techniques/ concepts related to business and management domain (RBTL4)
PLO 2.2: Interpret business decisions from multiple dimensions (RBTL5)
PLG 3 Communication (UG)
PLO 3.1 Develop professional presentations demonstrating effective visual presentation and oral skills (RBTL6)
PLO 3.2: Develop business documents demonstrating effective written skills (RBTL6)
PLG 4 Problem Solving (UG-BBA)
PLO 4.1: Evaluate complex business issues and their implications (RBTL5)
PLO 4.2: Propose solutions for complex business problems to operate effectively in the dynamic business environment (RBTL6)
PLG 5 Data-Driven decision making (UG - BBA Strategy and Business Analytics)
PLO 5.1 Develop and implement effective business strategies based on data-driven analysis (RBTL5)
PLO 5.2: Suggest business opportunities for data-driven solutions (RBTL6)
Students pursuing International curriculum must note that eligibility is according to AIU stipulations:
why_choose: Why choose this course? Cutting Edge tools for analytics Student driven (Synapse) club based on Strategy and Analytics Practical experience Industry relevant curriculum Cross-Disciplinary Approach Integration of Analytics and Strategy in Data driven decision Making
what_learn: What you will learn? Critical Thinking Strategic Thinking Communication and Visualization Forecasting and Modelling Predictive Analytics Data driven design thinking
modules: Modules Introduction to Business Strategy Interpersonal Communication Year 1 Foundation of Business Analytics Quantitative Technique Disruptive Strategies in VUCA world Behavioural Analytics for Managers Year 2 Power BI Introduction To Python Data Visualization Data-Driven Strategic Decision Making Applied Strategic Marketing Strategic Innovation Management Year 3 Financial Derivatives Meta Digital and Social Media Strategy Financial Analytics People Analytics Marketing Analytics HR metrics Environment society and Governance Business Research Method Year 4 Management Theory and Practice Internship Project/Research Thesis Business Strategy Business Simulation Interdisciplinary course Quantitative Research
career: Career prospects Strategy and business analytics encompass a wide range of job roles, each with its own set of responsibilities and focus areas. Here are some common types of jobs in this field: Business Intelligence (BI) Analyst Management Consultant Digital Analyst Transformational leaders Corporate Strategist Market Research Analyst Business development Analyst
